Class of '83

2020 | 1h 34m | Thrillers

Demoted to an academy job, a cop trains five foolhardy students as assassins in his risky revenge plot against police corruption and the underworld.

Starring: Bobby Deol,Bhupendra Jadawat,Hitesh Bhojraj

Watch all you want.

Class of ’83 | Official Trailer | Bobby Deol | Netflix India

Based on true events, Class of '83 is the gritty story of a policeman failed by the system. Will Vijay Singh (Bobby Deol) be able to fulfil his purpose or will the fire he ignites burn his own house down? Find out in Class of ’83, streaming on 21st August, only on Netflix.
